headline: Ask HN: Founder-friendly guide to equity grants / options packages?
description:
Can someone please recommend a good up-to-date guide on creating options pools (ESOP) / options packages that are written from the founder's perspective.

How many options to offer (relevant 2022 also), good vesting schedules etc.

Most of the guides are written from employee's perspectives, and have the tone that assumes the company is out to screw over its employees, so "ask for more because you will receive less".

I just don't want to perform mental gymnastics where I am reading some advice and then divide it by N because the advice is anti-company, and I am, well, the company, and then I end up as essentially that kind of adversarial asshole.

I mean is it salary + 1 month salary in stock options? Or is it 0.75 [market] salary in cash + 0.25 [market] salary in stock?

Thanks guys.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 方便创始人的股权授予/期权包指南？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 方便創始人的股權授予/期權包指南？
description_zh-Hans:
大多数指南都是从员工的角度写的，其语气是假设公司要坑害它的员工，所以要求更多，因为你会得到更少"。

我只是不想做精神上的体操，我在读一些建议，然后把它除以N，因为这些建议是反公司的，而我是，嗯，公司，然后我最后基本上是那种对抗性的混蛋。

我的意思是它是工资+1个月工资的股票期权？ 或者是0.75[市场]工资的现金+0.25[市场]工资的股票？

谢谢大家。
description_zh-Hant:
大多數指南都是從員工的角度寫的，其語氣是假設公司要坑害它的員工，所以要求更多，因為你會得到更少"。

我只是不想做精神上的體操，我在讀一些建議，然後把它除以N，因為這些建議是反公司的，而我是，嗯，公司，然後我最後基本上是那種對抗性的混蛋。

我的意思是它是工資+1個月工資的股票期權？ 或者是0.75[市場]工資的現金+0.25[市場]工資的股票？

謝謝大家。
